questions.question: This term refers to the framework of policies and technologies for ensuring that the right individuals have the appropriate access to technology resources.
questions.answer: What is Identity and Access Management (IAM)?

questions.question: This process involves verifying the identity of a user before granting access to resources.
This term refers to the practice of granting users the minimum level of access necessary to perform their tasks.
questions.answer: What is the Principle of Least Privilege?

questions.question: This technology is commonly used in IAM to manage user identities and control access to resources.
This term refers to the process of managing and controlling user access to resources based on their roles within an organization.
